reviewText: Very interesting. Showed to my students (I'm a Spanish teacher) and they were also very interested.

An ok video. I showed it to my high school students and the interest slowed after the first 20 minutes when the video slows down a bit. It would have been nice if the host made an attempt to correctly pronounce the Mexican locations and names. In general, a pretty good explanation without any cultural appropriation.
Excellent product & service. Hx Channel DVDs are always excellence.
Awesome video--good for older elementary and middle school students.
